item.description:
Note later start time: 1 p.m. rather than noon.

Swap theme #1: Obsession

Swap theme #2: ATCs of any theme using the Easel technique from the meetup (or a similar technique for creating ATCs that stand up on their own). 

Potluck: Please consider bringing something for our potluck lunch. Click here to sign up on the Message Board. 

Activity: Anne will demonstrate a technique for creating cool backgrounds from torn and painted papers. You can see some  example backgrounds and resulting ATCs in the Photos section, right here.

Most materials will be provided, but if you have favorite paintbrushes, please bring them.

Journals: See Meri's note about the journal exchange and show-and-tell below.

For more details about the day's activities, click here.
item.how_to_find_us: Use door off parking lot (toward back of building)

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ September Meetup in Natick: Saturday, 9/22
